mapper.name: Company_size
mapper.value: {{if(contains(14.`Company Size`; "-"); average(if(contains(substring(14.`Company Size`; 0; indexOf(14.`Company Size`; "-")); "K"); parseNumber(replace(substring(14.`Company Size`; 0; indexOf(14.`Company Size`; "-")); "K"; "")) * 1000; if(contains(substring(14.`Company Size`; 0; indexOf(14.`Company Size`; "-")); "M"); parseNumber(replace(substring(14.`Company Size`; 0; indexOf(14.`Company Size`; "-")); "M"; "")) * 1000000; parseNumber(substring(14.`Company Size`; 0; indexOf(14.`Company Size`; "-"))))); if(contains(substring(14.`Company Size`; indexOf(14.`Company Size`; "-") + 1; length(14.`Company Size`)); "K"); parseNumber(replace(substring(14.`Company Size`; indexOf(14.`Company Size`; "-") + 1; length(14.`Company Size`)); "K"; "")) * 1000; if(contains(substring(14.`Company Size`; indexOf(14.`Company Size`; "-") + 1; length(14.`Company Size`)); "M"); parseNumber(replace(substring(14.`Company Size`; indexOf(14.`Company Size`; "-") + 1; length(14.`Company Size`)); "M"; "")) * 1000000; parseNumber(substring(14.`Company Size`; indexOf(14.`Company Size`; "-") + 1; length(14.`Company Size`)))))); if(contains(14.`Company Size`; "K"); parseNumber(replace(14.`Company Size`; "K"; "")) * 1000; if(contains(14.`Company Size`; "M"); parseNumber(replace(14.`Company Size`; "M"; "")) * 1000000; parseNumber(14.`Company Size`))))}}

variables.name: Job_title_score
variables.value: {{if(contains(lower(14.`Job title`); "ceo") | contains(lower(14.`Job title`); "founder") | contains(lower(14.`Job title`); "owner"); 40; if(contains(lower(14.`Job title`); "cto") | contains(lower(14.`Job title`); "cfo") | contains(lower(14.`Job title`); "vp") | contains(lower(14.`Job title`); "head"); 30; if(contains(lower(14.`Job title`); "manager") | contains(lower(14.`Job title`); "lead"); 20; if(contains(lower(14.`Job title`); "executive") | contains(lower(14.`Job title`); "analyst"); 10; 5))))}}

variables.name: Industry
variables.value: {{if(contains(lower(14.`Company Industry`); "saas") | contains(lower(14.`Company Industry`); "software") | contains(lower(14.`Company Industry`); "it") | contains(lower(14.`Company Industry`); "ai"); 20; if(contains(lower(14.`Company Industry`); "ecommerce") | contains(lower(14.`Company Industry`); "fintech"); 15; if(contains(lower(14.`Company Industry`); "marketing") | contains(lower(14.`Company Industry`); "agency") | contains(lower(14.`Company Industry`); "consult"); 10; 5)))}}

contents.text:
Hi {{17.`Employee Name`}},

We help {{17.`Company Name`}} teams get more qualified leads and close deals faster using automation.

mapper.subject: How {{17.`Company Name`}} can get more leads

contents.text:
Hi {{17.`Employee Name`}},

We work with companies in {{17.Industry}} to automate lead capture and follow-ups.

Let me know if youd like to learn more.

Hi {{17.`Employee Name`}},

Thanks for your interest. We help businesses like {{17.`Company Name`}} manage leads more efficiently.

Well be in touch with useful tips.

notes.content: Data Enrichment using combine enrichment API of hunter io for getting person and company details
Webhook receives the data from Google form, LinkedIn, Typeform, Website sources
Finding Average of Company Size because company size is get in ranges
mapping company_size_score,industry_score and job_title_score based on some condition for getting leads score
assigning sales representative based on country and job title and lead status based on lead score
